about_the_game:
The Ark Adult Game offers an exhilarating blend of action and adventure set in a futuristic universe. Embark on a thrilling journey to collect and preserve diverse races and species, exploring perilous encounters and uncovering the mysteries of the universe. With captivating gameplay and rich storytelling, immerse yourself in this unique gaming experience today!



"Humanity's hopes cling to survival aboard the Ark, a ship drifting among the stars. But as the Syphoners, an enigmatic force, threaten the balance of life, the crew must collect DNA to prevent universal extinction. Will you bring hope to humanity or succumb to the unknown?"

In their expansion, humans discovered a great danger threatening the entire universe. It's an alien species that functions as parasites, invading planets by directly embedding themselves into the inhabitants to learn about their culture, technology, etc. This threat has already decimated civilizations more advanced than humanity, so humans are ill-equipped to confront it.

Faced with the imminent disappearance of every form of life at the hands of the parasites, a unified force emerges. Unable to win a direct confrontation, they devise a new plan: The Ark. This spacecraft houses the future of humanity, preserving genetic material to create life. Launched into orbit before the parasites make contact with human colonies, the Ark aims to prevent humanity from being completely forgotten.



  • Create your character as you like, whether male or female
  • Meet a wide variety of characters and maintain relationships with them
  • Explore inhospitable places and discover forgotten civilizations
  • Face your enemies with a vast arsenal of weapons
  • Follow the story through cinematics
  • Delve deep into the lore through dialogues with characters
  • Do secondary tasks to receive juicy rewards

content_descriptors.notes: Experience a mature and immersive narrative in the game, which includes scenes featuring adult content, including full-frontal nudity and sexual scenes with a complete genital representation. Player discretion is advised.

name: The Ark Adult Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 3.2GHZ or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 2GB or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Ark Adult Game is an immersive action-adventure title set in a futuristic universe. Explore, collect, and preserve various races and species as you navigate through perilous encounters.
